NounVerbTask.TEXT: High-intensity statin therapy* is recommended for patients with known ASCVD, LDL-C levels >190 mg/dL, and DM, with 10-y risk >7.5%. Moderate-dose statin therapy** is recommended for the other treatment groups (patients with DM but with 10-y risk <7.5% and those without DM who have a 10-y risk >7.5%).

NOUN.source: Summary of the ACC/AHA Guideline on the Treatment of Blood Cholesterol to Reduce ASCVD
